titles: Linsi-woolsie. Or Two centuries of epigrammes. Written by William Gamage Batchelour in the Artes
author: Gamage, William.
publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathewes for Henry Bell, and are to besold [sic] at his shop in Bethelem without Bishops Gate, at the signe of the Sunne,
